name: Last Day on Earth: Survival Cheats
shortDescription: Last Day on Earth: Survival iGMM Cheats by DiDA for iOSGods.com! Hack Features - Unlimited Coins -> Buy something with coins that you can afford to increase them. If you have no coins, see this topic. - Anti-Cheat -> Disable Cheat detection. - Item Duplication -> Split an Item to get more. - Free Crafting -> Craft without required items. Do not craft unreleased items or your game will stop loading! See the Club to find out which ones you shouldn't craft. - Free Building -> Build without required items. - Free Upgrading -> Upgrade without required items. - Building hack -> Thanks to the features above - Infinite Weapon/Item Durability - Infinite All Armor Durability  - Unlimited Skill Points -> Use skill points to increase them. - No Level Requirement for Crafting - Loot Boxes Hack! -> Open 1 loot box and gain 10,000! If IAP/Free Store is patched, use this to gain a lot of loot boxes when opening one. - Item Increase Hack -> When taking an item from your inbox, it will take it and still keep it in your inbox. If you have a lot of the same item, you can increase said item as much as you want! - Unlock All Items -> All blueprints unlocked! - Bow One Hit Kill -> One Hit Kill enemies with your bow. WORKS on killing The Big One! - Unlimited Consumables -> Unlimited Food, Water, etc. - High Rate of Fire -> One Hit Kill. Works well on Shotguns. - Unlimited Weapon Blueprints - Using the Recycler / Weapon Specialist in Bunker Alfa and the Unlimited Consumable Items Hack, you can get every Weapon Blueprints in the game. - Free Store / Free In-App Purchases! -> Buy in-game Loot Boxes for free! This is automatically active. This feature seems to get patched by the developer OTA most of the time. So use it to buy some crates and then use the Loot Boxes Hack below to store up on crates in the future! - Minigun Doesn't Overheat - Bow Instant Charge for Shot -> Tap on the shoot icon to instantly shoot your bow without having to charge it.
author: DiDA
